body_html:
I think I understand. The interface contract of tf.matrix_band_part says that num_upper "Must have the same type as num_lower", and you've complied, passing 0 (which you think of as an int32) and tf.shape(...)[...]. But this throws an error.

Can I ask you to put together a very short reproduction script, please?
